â”‚ Railway had 2 major outages in the first month, causing â”‚
â”‚ downtime for our customers. Their support was slow to â”‚

â”‚ Need to add "uptime SLA" and "support responsiveness" â”‚
â”‚ as top criteria for infrastructure decisions. Should â”‚
â”‚ have done a 30-day trial before full migration. â”‚
